## EventRouter.listeners() method

Get all listeners for a specific event type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
listeners(eventType: keyof EventPayloads): EventEmitter.EventListener<any, string>[];
```

</td><td>

The type of event to get listeners for.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
